attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Due to the revelations that a large number of politicians consider being a member of Parliament as nothing but means to obtain money and goods at the tax payers’ 
expense, it has become quite clear that the general public hold no, or very little, respect for either Parliament, or its members. 

In order to regain respect and credibility both at home and abroad, Parliament must be dissolved immediately, and a general election held.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
